content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work at around 4:30am. i was driving over a pass known as razorback mountain, a known hotspot for ufo activity. i noticed a bright, orange flashing low in the sky to the north east. bright enough to light up the surrounding sky, at first i assumed it to be a very odd coloured lightning that i've never seen before, as it was as bright as lightning and giving off a lot of energy, but as i observed it for the next 20 minutes whilst driving that didn't appear to be the case, as the flashing seemed very regular, not the random flashing of lightning, more like the flashing lights you'd see on a plane but much, much brighter. it was also very localised in one small spot and looked like it was almost a long diamond shape. i was able to determine that it was fairly close, a couple of miles away at most at my closest point to it, due to the fact it was stationary and it didn't take long for me to pass it. after seeing it in the distance in front of me, within about five or six minutes i was passing to the left of it, and not long after that i could see it in the rear view mirror. i've been driving this route in these early hours for 13 years and have never seen this.
content.summary: Large flashing orange ligjt

content.detailedDescription: Walking home at 11:30 pm, it was a cloudless starless sky over the city.  i happened to look up to see three greenish-white lights, in equilateral formation, moving eastward, with one apex leading.  thinking it was an airplane, i noticed a red light at the exact centre, which is odd since the red light is always on the left wingtip.  then i noticed the object was completely silent, travelling due east at least 500 feet up.  an airplane soon followed, over 1000 feet up. i could clearly hear the engine.  the object continued east in a straight path until lost behind the trees.
content.summary: Equilateral triangle formation of three greenish-white lights, red light in the centre, completely silent, about 500 feet up.

content.detailedDescription: I came outside to look at the stores like i do almost every night and i looked up towards the east. i saw three objects in the shape of the tube flying in a line side-by-side in the easterly direction. took maybe 2 to 3 seconds and they were gone.
content.summary: Looked up towards libra in a large open area between tree in back yard and forest behind house and saw three tube like objects (would of looked like headlights tracking along an interior wall except there was no traffic) flew east fast

content.detailedDescription: Looked out of window suddenly saw a large gray, object with red blinking light come toward me, it slowed up and went over my house. a humming noise .
content.summary: Looked out of window saw a object come toward me, slowed up and went over my house.

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside at 1700 on april 8, 2016 in locust, nc. it was a sunny day with large bulky clouds and 70 degrees. saw two buzzards circling and looked above them and noticed a thin white cigar shape quietly moving slowly between clouds. the direction was from north to south and lasted about 60 seconds before i lost visibility. very strange because no sound was heard and no wings were seen. usually a silver or metallic appearance is visible from a plane that low and wings should have been seen. if a pencil is held at arm length the eraser would provide an example of the size (width) of the shape seen this day.
content.summary: Noticed a thin white cigar shape quietly moving slowly between clouds. the direction was from north to south and lasted about 60 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
On my way to visit my mom,  she picked me up right before 8pm. i spotted the ufo and noticed it because the sun hadn't been out much this day it was overcast and cloudy. 
i looked up to see what caught my perifrial vision. dark grey color not far away it hovered for a second and started going up at an angle unlike planes fly up down left right. this goy faster and vanished. it did not go behind any cloud. afterwards, i and my mom were shocked and confused. 

interesting night to say the least.
content.summary: My mom driving and me in passenger seat. took 20 seconds and it dissappeared, as it slowly drifted away at a side angle

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving to work down a dark country road, between two empty fields, a route that i've taken daily for the past year and a half, a rectangular shape about four feet wide passed across the street in front of me. the shape was transparent, and it was only visible because i had my high-beams on. my beams kind of reflected off of it as they would off of fog. however, this shape had very definite sides. i could not tell where the top of it was, because i could not see anything beyond how high my headlights went. i first caught sight of it as it was in the oncoming traffic lane. i thought it might be a shadow, but there were no other cars on the road, and no other sources of light out of the ordinary. i realized the shape was moving across the street in front of me. i lifted off the gas, to make sure i would not intercept it. the shape did not vary in size or form as it moved to the right. the width and speed remained consistent. i had chills come across my body as i watched it travel, and realized i had no idea what it was. it reached the right side of the road when i was probably no more than eight feet away from it. at that point it was leaving the range of my headlights, and was no longer visible.  for the past week and a half, i've been focusing on that portion of the road, to see if i could find any other explanation, but can't come up with anything. i'm basically just reaching out here to see if anyone has any ideas, and if anyone else has ever encountered anything like this.
content.summary: Misty shadow-like shape with straight sides passed slowly across street immediately in front of me.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving home from my dad's house when our 4 year old son says "mom" "dad" it's an airplane! we were at the stoplight headed north east. it was a little after 10 pm when we first encountered the object in the sky. as i observed it more i noticed the shape was not like a normal airplane or aircraft i have ever seen. it was in the shape of a triangle with two even sides and one side longer than the other two. on each corner of the object were extremely bright white lights. in between each of the white lights were a set of reddish orange lights. i tried to capture a photo but my girlfriends phone was oddly too low to capture one. as we came off the light we studied it harder and noticed as we passed it it stayed above us and didn't seem to be moving at all. we were very confused but also curious to know what it was exactly. we wondered are we the only ones seeing this for it was in a open sky over a park and very low. no lower than about 300 to 500 feet. about a quarter mile down the bend we lost sight of it but ended up coming across another one on our right side going south east at this time. this object was the exact same as the one we just seen not even a mile apart from each other. no two planes would be that close to each other in the sky. this object seemed to be moving slowly like a helicopter but simply by the shape could not be one. we didn't hear the chopper rotors so we knew it simply wasn't. we hit a patch of trees coming around a bend as we came up to the light. once we hit the clearing i noticed it vanished from the sky. i looked as far i can see in the direction it was going but there was nothing to be seen. just gone like that. whatever it was had to be a very fast moving object to lose my sight like that. as i write this i still wonder what it could of been and wish to have been able to know. it was a very exciting experience altogether.
content.summary: Our 4 year old son told us it was an airplane. we knew it was something else though.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a bright light that for the first few seconds i thought was a plane when i saw it start to drop,the dart around then it rose quite high into the sky then drop 10 to 15 degrees while flashing the darted back high into the sky then slowly fell again. it did this several times. this sighting last about 90 seconds.It then rose high into the sky and disappeared. when rising and falling it also ducked behind clouds. i would guess it was over or close to lake huron.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright small globe

content.detailedDescription:
Exact location of sighting:
n37 degrees 46.199’w122degrees10.448 - exact coordinates of ufo location.

i have seen several ufos over the past 20 years, but most of those (except one) were smaller lighted objects at a great distance away. the sighting i am reporting in this report is a game-changer for me!  it was the diameter of at least 100 yard across! 

i was driving my minivan across the san mateo bridge heading east on the night of april 11, 2015. time was 11:55 pm. the bridge traffic was completely stopped due to only a single lane of traffic being directed through heavy construction with jack hammers making repairs on middle lanes. this was at the highest arch point of the bridge. it took me about 40 minutes to drive about 1 mile to finally clear all the construction crews and bright work lights. i had a single male passenger, about 35 years old in the back of my van who was from ukraine and he did not speak english. we could not communicate with a single word that he understood. he had his head buried in his texting while i was driving.

as soon as the traffic bottle neck cleared, i tromped on the accelerator and started speeding on the downhill side of the bridge, about 3 miles from the east shore of hayward. i had just picked up speed to about 70 miles an hour when the interior of my entire van was blasted with a nearly blinding green light! it came directly from the ride side of my van. my first impulse was to get mad at the work crews for using more lights that made driving unsafe. but in the split second that this light hit, i had to hit the brakes and hope no one was close behind me. then, i looked out my window into the black void of the night sky (above the san francisco bay) and that's when i saw the ufo saucer traveling parallel with me at the same exact speed. it was gigantic and it had tilted it's bottom side towards me where i could see an incredible amount of detail. it was moving east along with me for about another 4 seconds, and then it slipped into a hard edge of a black slot in the night sky where it completely disappeared!
it did not dissolve, nor get misty and fade away. it looked exactly like it slipped into a time portal slot that had a vertical hard edge. 

when this was happening, i yelled out loud to my passenger in the back, (wow! look at this!). but after the glowing green space craft was gone, i turned around and looked at my passenger and tried to ask him if he saw the ufo. he couldn't figure out what i was saying. i had to wait until the next morning to call his girlfriend to tell her what had happened. but he never saw a thing since he was busy texting at the time. 

this experience was so amazing that it actually made me feel great that i had just witnessed a very real ufo, but with more detail than i have ever heard anyone describe before. i was excited, but scared at the same time.
i am a former abductee on two occasions, and my first thoughts were that maybe i would be getting another visit in the near future. i tried telling people that i know and trust, but they all looked at me like i was nuts.
so, i have kept this a secret for the entire past year. about 3 months after this encounter, i entered a key word search on the internet for "green ufo san francisco bay april 11, 2015". i found a hit from another website that originates out of florida. there was a report entered by another resident from union city (near hayward) who had seen a large green ufo on that same day, but early in the morning as he drove to work. it was located above the sf bay, exactly where i saw it late that same night! i am an artist and i immediately made a photoshop drawing of exactly what i witnessed - including all the minute details. (note: i am a 65 year-old homicide detective and i am trained to soak in a lot of details and info in a short span of time. over the years i have developed a skill at taking a "snapshot photo" of actual events that include many details. the photo composite i have created is an identical facsimile of exactly what i saw.  i have been inspired to finally report this sighting after one full year because april 11th is coming up in just 4 days and i plan on camping out along the shore of the san francisco bay where i will set up video and digital cameras in the longshot chance that history might repeat exactly one year later!
content.summary: While driving over a bridge, a huge flying saucer glowed bright green and then slid into a black portal door while i watched!

content.detailedDescription: One of farm tractors got stuck so we brought other tractors to get it out and sky was partly cloudy and i have seen a lot ufo's during the day so i got some other footage of a ship just a little higher than the cloud cover but i had to go back to my truck a i could feel the presence of something i couldn't see and started taking pictures and i know somethings will come up and it did!!
content.summary: I have seen lots of ufo's for the last 2 week so i keep takin pictures  even if don't see an object

content.detailedDescription: This morning at aprox 6:20am, i was driving south on 795. i believe i was just before the mcdonough rd overpass. i saw 3 lights in a row hovering above the horizon. it was just starting to become light and the sky was cloudy in some areas but where those lights were was crystal clear. as i came around the bend in the road, i should have been able to clearly see what this was. i first thought it could have been a helicopter if there was an accident on the beltway. there was no helicopter nor accident and the lights were just gone. they were there then they weren't there.
content.summary: Driving s on 795 saw three lights in a row hoverig, came around bend it was gone. i should've been able to see better

content.detailedDescription: My son and friend were golfing and observed ufos for approx 2 hours they were rectangular objects with a dark center and were traveling east to west on and off for 2 hours plus they were following each other along a similar flight path moving slowly, slower than a airplane would move.  after about two hours my son called me at home and i met him in a field south of the golf course, about 1/4 mile west of the foothills. as i was approaching the meeting i heard military jets flying in the area. after that the sighting wound down and we photographed one of the objects.
content.summary: Ufos traveled from east to west following each other on the same path

content.detailedDescription:
I was cutting the grass and looked up to see silver/grey metallic sphere hovering above trees to the south.  went in and got camera, came out and tried to zoom in on it.  i kept losing it when zoomed in so i zoomed out and took the photo with no magnification.  

i felt odd, strangely unexcited.  psychologically dulled.  i knew it was a ufo but i was totally detached from the experience.  took the photo and continued cutting grass, ignoring it.  looked up to see it had moved a little farther away but was still there.  i watched it because i felt i should, but really didn't want to. i saw it move slowly off to the south and eventually it went behind the trees.

the photo is disappointing because it looks like the moon or a balloon, and you can't see the reflection of the sun.  it also looks much farther away than it was. when i first saw it, the ufo was much closer and lower down.  by the time i got the camera and photographed, it was farther away.

i have always had an odd detached feeling about the experience which is uncharacteristic for me. it is like the psychological detachment i felt at the time i saw the ufo.

not an exciting or happy experience.
content.summary: Metallic/silver sphere moving very slowly and pausing 100 feet above trees

content.detailedDescription: Sitting outside military base happened to look up
content.summary: Hovered over power lines by military base. 3 lights, saw another over town of grenada resembling. let out a fog

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were returning from a meeting in fredonia. we had drove toward rt. 13 and had just emerged from a forested area to a cornfield, which had been harvested earlier. as i looked to my left to talk to my friend i saw an orange sphere off to the north approximately 500 feet away traveling to a point on the road we were headed down approximately 200 feet away. my friend, after seeing my attention had changed from him to something outside the window had looked also in the same direction. we both watched it travel across the road. i watched it till it went out of sight and his attention went back to the road. it appeared to be a little larger then basketball. it had an orange glow to it and was about a foot to 18" off the ground. we had a view over it as we were headed down a hill. it came to the tree lined road, never changed speed, which appeared to me to be traveling about the same speed as us, maybe 35 mph and went up and over the trees and the road, back down to the ground, changed direction and went off to the nw. the glow from it never seemed to light up the ground or anything else, which i would have thought it would having been so close to the ground. i then asked my friend "did you see that?" his reply was "don't ever ask me about it. i didn't see anything." it was a wet night with some rain sprinkles. it had rained earlier in the evening.
content.summary: Orange sphere, little larger then a basketball, moved along ground till it came to road we were on, up over trees, power lines crossed road back down to ground and off to nw.

content.detailedDescription:
At about 10;00 pm on august 15 2010, my friend and i had parked our car at rainy pass trailhead to climb s. early winters spire on the hwy 20 summit.
we were headed up a climbers trail towards the base of the climb, and as we were about 100 yards from the base of the mountain we were looking up at our route (approximately 11:45 pm) we saw what looked like a persons old fashioned lantern on the w face of s. early winters spire, thinking it was a climbing party w and old fashioned lantern. (about 3-4 feet in diameter and glowing orange-yellowish). the "lantern" then slowly started moving to the left (north) along the vertical wall away from us. it slowly and steadily moved away and around the wall wrapping around the rock face until out of sight. (we stood and watched it for about five minutes until it had disappeared).  
we then (cautiously!) began our ascent of the peak, reaching the summit right as the sun came up. i'll never forget that night as long as i live.

ironically, about 10 years prior i had seen a orange orb almost identical in size and color that came towards us at night in steilacoom park in lakewood wa, then vanished once it got close to us.
content.summary: Was approaching s.Early winters spire, watched orb sloly travel around peak awy from us.

content.detailedDescription:
In ocyober 1989 at about 7:30 pm i arrived to the 7-11 to fuel up my truck. it was night, but i could see because the city was lit up. while standing at pump a lady, who was also filling up, asked if i knew what that was in the sky. i looked from west to east and i saw a sphere. it was hovering next to the franklin mountain and was about 209-300 ft above the ground.  it was cloaked, transparent, but i could see the silohette of it.  it was huge, about the length of two jumbo jet airplanes. the silohette looked fuzzy, but i could see it. it did not display any flashing lights or or headlights like airplanes have. but, it did have lights that looked like flames at the bottom side, about the lower quarter of the sphere. although, the lights looked like flames, the lights didn't behave like flames.  it looked like waves of flames circling the sphere, inside the sphere, not on the exterior. 
we stood there for about 5 minutes and then it just diassapeared. not even 10 seconds after that a military helicopter, probably from ft. bliss, flew into the area from the north. 
during the time that the lady and myself stood out there i noticed that there was no traffic , but that street is usually a very busy street.
content.summary: Huge sphere hovering  about 300 ft above ground.

content.detailedDescription: I work the night shift in the california highway patrol, as i was leaving work around 4am in roseville california, a giant bright black triangular object descended from the clouds with 3 bright white lights, like lights that would light up a stadium, abruptly turned, came about 30 feet and hovered directly above me, then disappeared into the dark morning sky. i could not track the object. i watched it, and it seemed like when it saw me it was right above me. started directly north hovered above me, then shot off about north west of me. i do not know if i lost it in the dark sky or if it disappeared. i have never seen anything like it, and i have seen and been around a lot of aerial vehicles in my time in the highway patrol and us marines. the object was gigantic at least 10 times bigger than a 747 jumbo jet. it had 3 bright white lights at each end and a big red light in the middle. the red light was brighter than a stoplight. the object was completely silent, not a sound. it was dark black and solid. i checked my radar in my vehicle and nothing appeared to be out of the ordinary. when the object hovered directly over me, it only lasted about 1 minute, maybe less. then it completely disappeared. about 2 minutes later a military helicopter with what appeared to be solid black, flew by afterwards scoping the area, did a circle about 20 miles in between and then took off north of me towards interstate 80. the helicopter made a lot of noise and it was not one of ours. the triangular object was gigantic, frightened me, i was getting off work and due to tough scrutiny in my line of work i did not call it in. because my job is strict with psych evaluations and in fear of losing my job if i reported this or harming my career i wish to stay anonymous. i hope my sighting might help someone else with the similar sighting. gigantic triangle, hovered over me and then disappeared. i have seen a lot of crazy things in my 25 years as a highway patrol, but i have never seen anything quit like this. this one will keep me up at nights on my nights off.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Black triangle with bright lights at every corner and red light in the middle descended from clouds then changed direction, hovered over me, then disappeared. no sound

content.detailedDescription: Looking out of my bedroom window i noticed two strobe like lights swirling around the sky ... then a bright light appeared between the two.. this light started travelling upwards and grew brighter... it went behind a cloud then it was as if there was an explosion and puff of smoke came from the bottom and formed a smoke like circle.. the light then veered to the side and grew brighter and started travelling upwards again ... this then disappeared and so did the two strobes
content.summary: Bright light travelling upwards and strobes either side

content.detailedDescription: At about 4am on june 21st 2013, on my way home from a friends house in bayswater, a suburb outside of perth wa. i noticed a strange object in the sky behaving oddly and i new it was a ufo immediately as it's not the first i've seen, while watching this object from the car on my way home i seen the object change from a white diamond to a gold cross to a red circle and back to a white diamond at random intervals. after a 15-20 minute drive i arrived home and with the object still in the sky i decided to get my hd camera and film it, for over 25 minutes i continued to watch the object change shape and colour and record it on film. unfortunately i was getting too tired as it was getting to the point when the sun starts coming up and i still hadn't slept so i didn't get it leaving on film which over time i become increasingly disappointed in myself for not pushing through, however this is just one of dozens of sightings i've had in the perth area so i wasn't too blown away by the experience however its one of the largest and brightest objects i've ever seen and the encounter is the longest i've ever had.
content.summary: large shape and colour changing object, gold cross, white diamond, red circle, veiwed for about an hour

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were gazing at the moon which had a halo around it. we were talking on our front porch and just happened to see the beautiful halo around the moon.  i don't recall the exact time but it was around 9 - 9:45pm. i decided to try taking a picture using my iphone 6 plus with the flash disabled. i snapped several pictures and noticed a ball of light directly below the moon and it appeared as if it came out of or around the moon. as i snapped photos fairly rapidly the object dropped down, moved to the left of the moon slightly ( all of this from my perspective ), then slowly moved down and to the right and after a minute or less it moved upwards and to the right of the moon. if using a clock to demonstrate.....The object appeared at 6 o'clock, moved to the 8 o'clock position and after changing course counter clockwise finished its movement around 3 o'clock. the only movement after it arrived at the 3 o'clock position was it moved away from the moon slightly, stopped and we observed it in that position for a period of time, i don't know how long, it was difficult for either of us to look away from the direction of the moon. we sometime later, i don't know how long exactly, went back inside our house. i came back out an hour or so later and the object was gone.

the first photos i took only show the halo. all subsequent pictures show the object in different positions. none of the photos were altered in anyway, except one which i tried to zoom in on the object.

my first thought was it must be a star ... until it changed direction. i served 6 years in the united states marine corps and i am a combat veteran. i have witnessed many lights in the sky at night and i was on the invasion force during the first persian gulf war. it wasn't a flare, an aircraft, a shooting star or anything else i've witnessed before. living in sc i know what the stealth aircraft out of north airbase look like....It did not appear to be anything military related. i honestly have no clue what it was.
content.summary: While observing a halo around the moon an object appeared as if coming from behind the moon.

content.detailedDescription:
1.) at the time i had arrived to the beach in clearwater beach, fl a group of 4 girls and 3 guys went to the beach for a few drinks and a good time.

2.) my friend brandon quickly got my attention to an unusual anomaly in the sky moving rapidly from south-southeast to north-northeast.

3.) we regularly visited this beach day and night and theres an air force base aross the bay
as well as aircraft of large and small size flying into pinellas county airport as well as tampa international airport. i'm the son of a pilot and im familiar with typical rare of speed on private/commercial/military craft. this bared no resemblance to what we (as a group watched). once my buddy brandon noticed the craft coming rapidly from the south, it crossed the whole sky in front of us in a matter or seconds at what appeared to be between 20,000-35,000ft elevation doing at least mach 3 or 4, silently. the craft was a vertical row of 3 glowing orbs/dots. it looks like a division sign (÷) in which the middle orb/dot circled the center of the exterior or bounced back and forth horizontally like a game of pong. 

4.) the duration of the event lasted only 7 seconds at most, maybe as short  as 3-4 seconds.
it moved slower then a meteor and didnt enter our atmosphere and burn up, it moved from south to north thru the sky as far as the eye can see. the craft vanished before it should have been out of vision. it seemed as though every time the middle light would pulse the whole craft would fade then glow. as though the center pulsing light was the source of its electromagnetic energy. eventually fading into the clear night sky.

5.) it made me think outside the box after witnessing it with a group of friends and we all saw it. i didn't think much about it until i became a amateur ufologist and did my research. i believe this technology to be of extraterrestrial. but the craft i believe is back  engineered and was being tested by black budget industrial military corporation. 

6.) as the object passed about 10-15 miles out over the gulf, while clearly watching the anomaly it vanished from sight before it should have. by that i mean it vanished after passing right over me. anything moving that fast , in formation of 2 still orbs and the middle moving front to back, or it was one vessel. the shape is hard to determine, if it was one craft then it could of been an oval, cigar, or diamond shape. heres a simple diagram of the anomaly:

                               •
 south -->       <---- • ---->         --> north
                               •
content.summary: Ufo clearwater beach fall 2007

content.detailedDescription: I've been having an excesive number of ufo/abduction nightmares for the last week. the object has been visible from 2am - 4:30 am for the last week and a half. i have not been able to sleep at all for the last two days due to anxiety concerning the object and the nightmares. tonight i was able to see it more clearly, and with steading the camera on a table, i was able to get 18 pictures that show the ?Leading edge? of the object,as well as multipule colors. it reamains in the same area for 2-4 hours each night.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Three close lights with red center trim

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling on 95 out side jordon oregon toward boise to deliver my load .Istop to take a30 break it was almost 1am got out of my semi to do a walk around ck my rig then notice some bright light on the side of my trailer i looked omer to the north to see this bright light coming down out of dark night desending rapidly made a sudden stop right before it landed and started scanning the ground with brighter light in a triangle shape very swift motion and make sudden stops i new this air craft wasn't anything i have ever seen i served in the military and have been around aircraft . i woke up my wife who sleeping to see the last part of this air craft then another showed up hovering but in a triangle shap but with red lights as if it was watching the other craft do its thing ? and suddenly stopped as if they notice me watching them an filming them with my i phone and the lights vanished as i looked for them in the sky i saw a giant black cloud hovering over the landscape wife went back in the sleeper and was getting back in the truck notice a red light across the street and started moving radicle back and forth i front of me i felt like they were child minds i was never scared or worried i didn't fill any threat i have vidio and photo to reaffirm my contact to what happen .I never believed there was such a thing ufos i am a true believer now i haven't been able to get over what happen that night
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Heading e 95 oregon stop for break notice12:50 am got of trk notice bright lights coming down out of the night sky before it landed it'll started moving fast like a triangle shape like scanning the ground with bright lights some color

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to catch some fresh air before going to sleep.   it is a clear night.   ever since my experience almost 30 years ago,  i always look to see if i can spot similar erratic movement in the sky tonight i did.  it is amazing!   i tried to take video with my phone and i doubt anything can be seen,  but finally i get to see this again. the object moves erratically and at first appears to jyst be a star until movement is noticed.  clockwise,  and counterclockwise circles,  sometimes it almost moves like a square,  left right,  north south,  it moves. it appears to be pulsating lights,  also at one point it looked like a smaller star shot out from it.   i'm so happy to have seen this again.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Appears as a star,  but moves erratically up down left right,  clockwise,  and counterclockwise.  experienced similar event approximately 30 years ago.

content.detailedDescription: As in my prior report i was outside the front door of my home having a cigarette and looking up in the eastern sky as i often do i watched a faint satellite size light making in human directional changes and movements. i can use the stars near it   to see is various movements and speed changes. i have to come up with a way too film this because it's so faint and hard see even with my binoculars. i filmed a laser on my couch to recreate the movements the light makes i will try to attached it to this report. i'm becoming fascinated by finding an answer to this mystery and will sign up soon as a member.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A few days ago i reported a dim satellite size light making extreme directional changes and i witnessed it again tonight.

content.detailedDescription: I have been seeing this objects and photographing them for more than 2 weeks, let me mention that i have not been looking for them i do take lots of pictures and upload them but like i said not focusing my pictures on them until 2 weeks ago when i saw an objects flying right in front of me but kind of far,and fortunately my cell phone takes very high quality pictures, let me tell you that i do have quite a few pictures where wether on purpose or not i got quite a few pictures of the object but wednesday 6th i saw a lot ships passing by just in from of me when i think they saw me taking pictures and video taping also when i saw two (2) balls leaving these ships ( i counted 3 like a small parade, this balls just flew all the way to stop in front of me and transform  in to what i thought looked like lips or a big mouth and suddenly my cell phone was blocked by these two mouths look a like and i felt king of strange my head at least was a feeling kind hyper,after that i can feel their presence everywhere i go, i do have quite a few pictures of them may that's what they are after of
content.summary: I was video taping the objects when i saw 2 balls coming from the objects and block my cell  phone so i stopped filming the event

content.detailedDescription:
the event started at 5:00am central time. the siting started over the neighbors house across the street, then slowly seemed to make its way over to our house.  
  after getting some stuff off the couch and straightening up, i walked back to the kitchen and ended up stopping in front of the dining room window to see a bright light. the light was bigger than a star, and much brighter. it was like looking at a much smaller sized sun.  it was like staring at a car's headlights.  there was no defined edge.  instead, the light rays radiated in all directions. there were no light beams coming from the object.  it was a bright orb that was moving quite slowly and had no sound to it.   when i first saw it, it was to the right of me at a slightly se direction and travelling left toward the north. i tried to turn off all the lights to see it better. as it drew closer, it made a turn towards the west.  it was then i noticed 3 flashing lights on it located in an area from the middle to the bottom of the object and flashing from left to right. they didn't flash together but instead they sequenced, 1,2,3.  i tried to get an even better look, but when i looked back, it seemed to have escaped over my house and disappear.  it's speed was the same and it was completely silent throughout the siting. 
  i stay up all night nearly every night.  i'm very familiar with what my neighborhood is like at this time,  also, in my house, you can hear a car pass, an airplane or jet fly over, kids playing down the street, or anything. this thing, as sure as heck, i couldn’t hear at all!  
  after thinking about this today, the object reminded me of what a very bright chinese lantern would look like with left to right flashing lights.  only it was round and not oval and it didn't flicker.  honestly, i've never seen a chinese lantern ever with flashing lights!  i would question it being a toy drone, chinese lantern, or something like that being flown around.  but at this time of night/day, i’m also highly doubting it.
content.summary: Small bright light that hovered and moved slowly to the left, turning then slowly flashing three lights from left to right
